jobDescription:
Role Summary/Purpose:

Sr Software Engineer in X-ray Engineering organization is an experienced software engineering role responsible for owning and programming components in X-ray Device Management & Systems Controls Software teams.  

Essential Responsibilities:

In this role you will:

Work with X-ray product software and own a component, feature or a feature set
Take ownership of small and medium sized tasks and deliver, while mentoring and helping team members
Work cross functionally with other teams and contribute to design discussions
Take initiative and to explore alternate technologies and approaches to solving problems
Apply principles of SDLC, Agile methodologies and Continuous Integration
Perform software troubleshooting and investigations of components and features
Continuously expand technical knowledge, keep abreast of emerging software technologies and apply them to the product software
Identify, plan, and track development, integration, reliability, verification, and design transfer tasks
Work on software platform goals for X-Ray hardware abstraction 
 

Basic Qualifications:

 

·         Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering or equivalent

·         A minimum of 3 years of professional experience in software development

·         Proven hands-on experience with object-oriented programming languages, primarily C++

·         Skilled in core data structures and algorithms 

·         Experience working on Linux based platforms

·         Working knowledge in configuration management tools

·         Strong analytical skills, and experience in software development lifecycle

Additional Eligibility Requirements:

·         Must be willing to work out of an office located in New York, NY

 

Desired Characteristics: 

Master’s degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering or equivalent
10+ years of software development experience with C++
3+ years of Python /shell scripting experience 
Expert in writing code that meets standards and delivers desired functionality using the technology selected for a project. 
Experience working in complex software development projects
Strong oral, written communication skills and interpersonal skills
Adapt to new environments, changing requirements and pivots quickly as needed
Identify opportunities for innovation and offers new ideas.
Takes initiative to experiment with new software frameworks
Engineering project management experience with Agile Teams
Medical Device Software Development Experience
Software Platforming Experience
Networking and Wi-Fi experience
